msContents.summary: This manuscript is of Viṣṇupurāṇa. It ends abruptly in the middle of the 6th Amśa 7th chapter 46th verse. The first folio is broken. The first leaf has verses from end of the first chapter and beginning of the 2 chapter of the 1st aṃśa.

msItem.title: Viṣṇupurāṇa

msItem.explicit:
prā
ṇāyāmena pavanaiḥ pratyāhāreṇa cendriyaiḥ vaśīkṛtaistataḥ kuryāt sthitañcetaḥ śūbhāśraye khāṇḍikyaḥ kathyatāmme mahābhāga cetaso ya śubhāśrayaḥ

extent.measure: 2 guard folios, 36 blank folios and 111 written folios.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin but some folio are without foliation.
supportDesc.condition: Some folio have wormholes. Broken folio at the beginning. The blank folio at the end have water patches. Small white fungus spots are seen on the folio.

handNote.desc: Small clear hand writing but due to faint ink and patches of fungus reading is difficult.

additions.desc: Śrīviṣṇupurāṇam is written in the left margin of the first folio.
Number 49 is written on the front guard with pink pencil.

listBibl.bibl: The Critical Edition of the Viṣṇupurāṇam, critically edited by M. M. Pathak. Vadodara : Oriental Institute 1997-1999.

encodingDesc.p: Dots to show continuation of the text.

maitreyaḥ paripapraccha praṇipatyābhivādya ca || tvatto hi vedādhyayanam

t prasādāt muni
nya taścaitaccarācaraṃ
munisattama devādīnāṃ tathā vaṃśān manu
t | prāṇāyāma sa vijñeyassabījo bīja eva ca paraspareṇābhibhavaṃ prāṇāpānyau yadanilau kurutassadvidhānena tṛtīyassaṃyamāttayoḥ tasya cālaṃbanavatassthūlarūpaṃ dvijottama ālaṃbanamanantasya yogi
no bhyasatassmṛtaḥ | śabdādiṣvanuraktāni nigṛhyākṣāṇi yogavit kuryāttcittānukārīri pratyāhāraparāyaṇaḥ vaśyatā paramā tena jāyate ticalātmanāṃ indriyāṇāmavaśyaistairna yogī yogasādhanaḥ prā
